titleStmt.title: Advertisement of a powder which is a most safe and speedy help for the stone and gravel, and those miseries which attend them, as pain in the back, stoppage of urine, cholick, &c. of which, in short, take this impartial account.

notesStmt.note: Title taken from caption and first lines of text.
Wing says the British Library has two settings.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
